Because this is a “did”-style message, the undo manager sends the message after it performs the undo.

The system notifies observers of the message when the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NotificationCenter] posts the notification and vice versa.

# UndoManager.DidUndoChangeMessage

**Structure**

A message that an undo manager sends after undoing a change.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DidUndoChangeMessage
```

## Overview

The undo manager posts this message after you call [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/undo()] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager/undoNestedGroup()]. Because this is a “did”-style message, the undo manager sends the message after it performs the undo.

Observe this message type with the identifier [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NotificationCenter/MessageIdentifier/didUndoChange], or specify its type directly to the `addObserver(of:for:using:)` method. The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NotificationCenter/MainActorMessage/Subject] of this message type is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/UndoManager].

This message interoperates with the notification [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/Name-swift.struct/NSUndoManagerDidUndoChange]. The system notifies observers of the message when the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NotificationCenter] posts the notification and vice versa.

## Initializers

- **init(groupIsDiscardable:)**: Creates a did undo change message.

## Instance Properties

- **groupIsDiscardable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the undo group as a whole is discardable.

## Working with notification messages

- **UndoManager.WillUndoChangeMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends before undoing a change.
- **UndoManager.WillRedoChangeMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends before redoing a change.
- **UndoManager.DidRedoChangeMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends after redoing a change.
- **UndoManager.CheckpointMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends at certain checkpoints.
- **UndoManager.DidOpenUndoGroupMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends after opening an undo group.
- **UndoManager.WillCloseUndoGroupMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends before closing an undo group.
- **UndoManager.DidCloseUndoGroupMessage**: A message that an undo manager sends after closing an undo group.

## Conforms To

- NotificationCenter.MainActorMessage
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
